koohiiStory1: You decide to go salmon fishing, so you ride a mountain goat to the top of the road. Under the light of the moon, as it's illegal, you catch the salmon going upstream.
koohiiStory2: In this kanji we see a mountain goat that decided to go upstream along a road, but for some reason it will only go upstream when the full moon is up. It's actually stubborn like a mountain goat about not going upstream along the road at any other period of time. The road itself is also very confused about this.
jp_example_words: 遡る(さかのぼる): go back, go upstream, make retroactive
Ru_Radicals: 并, 込 (внутрь), 屮 (росток), 月 (месяц)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: on the first day of the month (朔) you move (辶) to go upstream

遡字的基本解释

遡
sù
同“溯”。

遡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sù］
［《廣韻》桑故切，去暮，心。］
(1)逆流而上。
(2)向着；面对。
(3)寻求；追溯。
(4)通“愬”。诉说。

遡字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　遡； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1263第15
【廣韻】桑故切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】蘇故切，?音素。【說文】同泝。【詩·秦風】遡洄從之。【註】逆流而上也。【又】遡遊從之。【註】順流而下也。　又【集韻】嚮也。【正韻】迎也。【詩·大雅】遡其過㵎。【註】響過㵎而居也。【又】如彼遡風。【註】如嚮風之人，唈而不能息也。　又與愬通。訴告也。【戰國策】衞君跣行，告遡于魏。【註】遡、愬同。　又【正字通】溯㴑泝?同。
